price: 11. (As they denied Allâh’s Message) they will be a defeated host like the Confederates of the old times (who were defeated).
arabic: جُندٞ مَّا هُنَالِكَ مَهۡزُومٞ مِّنَ ٱلۡأَحۡزَابِ

version.title: English Translation - Hilali and Khan
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English by Taqi-ud-Din Al-Hilali and Muhsen Khan

meta.transliteration: jundun mā hunālika mahzūmun mina al-aḥzābi
